title: Smart Data Models - Ucifi / Location
description: This LwM2M Object provides a range of location telemetry related information which can be queried by the LwM2M Server.. objectID:'6'. objectURN:'urn:oma:lwm2m:oma:6'. lwm2mVersion:'1.0'. objectVersion:'1.0'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

type.description: Property. It must be equal to `Location`.

Latitude.description: Property. The decimal notation of latitude, e.g. -43.5723 [World Geodetic System 1984].. resourceID:'0'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Mandatory'. units:'lat'.

Longitude.description: Property. The decimal notation of longitude, e.g. 153.21760 [World Geodetic System 1984].. resourceID:'1'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Mandatory'. units:'lon'.

Altitude.description: Property. The decimal notation of altitude in meters above sea level.. resourceID:'2'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'. units:'m'.

Radius.description: Property. The value in this resource indicates the radius of a circular area in meters. The circular area is used to describe uncertainty about a point for coordinates in a two-dimensional coordinate reference systems (CRS). The center point of a circular area is specified by using the Latitude and the Longitude Resources.. resourceID:'3'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'. units:'m'.

Velocity.description: Property. The velocity of the LwM2M Client, as defined in [3GPP-TS_23.032].. resourceID:'4'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Timestamp.description: Property. The timestamp of when the location measurement was performed.. resourceID:'5'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Mandatory'.

Speed.description: Property. Speed is the time rate of change in position of a LwM2M Client without regard for direction: the scalar component of velocity.. resourceID:'6'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'. units:'m/s'.
